forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy with occasional rain during the afternoon. High 18C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.

forecastday.title: Wednesday

forecastday.fcttext: Becoming partly cloudy after some morning rain. High 67F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Thursday

forecastday.fcttext: Partly to mostly cloudy. High 68F. Winds S at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.title: Friday

forecastday.title: Sunday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Some clouds in the morning will give way to mainly sunny skies for the afternoon. High 21C. Winds S at 15 to 25 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies. High 69F. Winds S at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Sunday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 11C. Winds SSE at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around 6mm.
